response.overview: In March 2022, Lao Wu came to Chengdu to film a documentary about Lao Yu and Sister Liu. Lao Yu and Sister Liu had been together for two years, their love seemingly calm and uneventful, but Lao Wu gradually sensed undercurrents within their intimate relationship. As filming progressed, Lao Yu and Sister Liu became increasingly curious about Lao Wu's motives… In the hazy blur of reality and illusion, the superficial romance of their relationship gradually faded.
response.title: How To Find Your Comrade In A Trance?
